sentences.en: a rather severe red-brick building
sentences.cn: 一幢相当简朴的红砖建筑

sentences.en: Coping with severe drops in temperature can be very difficult.
sentences.cn: 温度大幅下降可能会很难应付。

sentences.en: Drug smugglers can expect severe penalties.
sentences.cn: 毒品贩子会受到重判。

sentences.en: He has been fined five thousand pounds and given a severe reprimand.
sentences.cn: 他被罚款5,000英镑，并受到了严厉斥责。

sentences.en: He suffered severe brain damage after a motorbike accident.
sentences.cn: 在遭遇一次摩托车事故后，他的脑部严重受损。

sentences.en: He was recovering from a severe bout of flu.
sentences.cn: 他患了严重的流感，尚未痊愈。

sentences.en: His injuries were quite severe.
sentences.cn: 他的伤势很严重。

sentences.en: I got a severe telling off for not phoning him.
sentences.cn: 我因为没给他打电话，被狠狠训斥了一顿。

sentences.en: In a severe gale the ship split in two.
sentences.cn: 在一次大风中，船断成了两截。

sentences.en: In severe cases, the skin can crack and weep.
sentences.cn: 在恶劣的条件下，皮肤可能会开裂并流脓。

sentences.en: Larry began suffering severe headaches and violent mood swings.
sentences.cn: 拉里开始出现严重的头痛和剧烈的情绪波动。

sentences.en: Severe shock can bring on an attack of acne.
sentences.cn: 严重的惊吓会造成痤疮突发。

sentences.en: She continued to have severe stomach cramps, aches, fatigue, and depression.
sentences.cn: 她仍然患有严重的胃痉挛，感觉疼痛、疲乏、抑郁。

sentences.en: She had quite severe bruising and a cut lip.
sentences.cn: 她身上有严重的淤伤，嘴唇也破了。

sentences.en: She had suffered severe facial mutilations after an accident.
sentences.cn: 她在事故中被严重毁容。

sentences.en: She’s suffering from severe depression.
sentences.cn: 她患有严重的抑郁症。

sentences.en: The negotiations will be a severe test of his abilities.
sentences.cn: 这次谈判将是对他能力的严峻考验。

sentences.en: The psychiatrist successfully traced some of her problems to severe childhood traumas.
sentences.cn: 这位精神病学家将她的一些问题成功地追溯到她童年时代遭受的严重创伤。

sentences.en: The storm caused severe damage.
sentences.cn: 这场暴风雨造成了严重的破坏。

sentences.en: The team secured pictures of prisoners showing signs of severe beatings.
sentences.cn: 这个小组搞到了一些显示囚犯有被毒打痕迹的照片。

sentences.en: The US faces severe economic problems.
sentences.cn: 美国面临严重的经济问题。

sentences.en: We are in one of the most severe recessions in modern times.
sentences.cn: 我们正在经历现代最严重的一段经济衰退。
